mapper.sql: ID, begin_city, end_city, commander, cargo_type, volume, weight, remarks, status, loading_time, choose_style, release_date,telphone,homeid
mapper.insert: insert into shipment_info (ID, begin_city, end_city, commander, cargo_type, volume, weight, remarks, status, loading_time, choose_style, release_date,telphone,homeid ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beginCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commander,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cargoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loadingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chooseStyle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{releaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{homeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update shipment_info
begin_city = #{beginCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_city = #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
commander = #{commander,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cargo_type = #{cargoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
volume = #{volume,jdbcType=INTEGER},

choose_style = #{chooseStyle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
release_date = #{releaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update shipment_info set begin_city = #{beginCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_city = #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commander = #{commander,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cargo_type = #{cargoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, volume = #{volume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, loading_time = #{loadingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choose_style = #{chooseStyle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, release_date = #{releaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, telphone = #{releaseDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, homeid = #{releaseDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from shipment_info where 1=1 AND status =0 GROUP BY release_date DESC
select COUNT(0) from shipment_info where 1=1 AND status =0;
